workExpList.work_desc: Web-3D Developer. Use Vue.js to develop h5 application, in which Three.js has been used to display customers' 3D house environment. Users can customize walls, floors as well as furniture in 3D version.
Front-end intern. Use React functional components and hooks to develop single-page applications, and write test units by using Jest as well as Enzyme.

projectList.project_desc: h5 application. Display customers' 3D house environment. Users can customize walls, floors and furniture in 3D version.
projectList.project_content: Use Vue 2.7 to develop basic components and Three.js to create 3d house environment and realize users' customized operations. Pinia has been imported to achieve global state management.

A mobile web application developed by React Native. Users are able to login/logout, add to cart/wishlist, checkout by Paypal and modify personal information and so on. React Router has been used to achieve muptiple pages and Fire base realtime database has been utilized to store users' data.
 Project address: https://github.com/yzy98/DECO7381-prj

A student-time project(2D pixel style escaping game). Players need to live as long as possible with the background of alien invasion, and try to refresh the highest score in history. If the character moves forward, terrains and background images will be generated randomly and infinitely. 
 Project address: https://github.com/UQdeco2800/2021-ext-studio-2

aboutme.aboutme_desc:
I am a front-end developer who has more then one-year working experience in developing web applications. In the past year, I has been in charge of encapsulating basic components and creating 3D scenes. 
 I am eager to learn new technologies.
